top3.description_short: Comfortable villa with private pool and garden in the Son Vida hills, offering a quiet base close to Palma and nearby golf courses.
top3.description_long: This three-bedroom villa combines the privacy of a standalone house with easy access to Palma and the Son Vida golf courses. The single-level layout features an open living and dining room with fireplace, leading directly onto a covered terrace and lawned garden. The rectangular pool is bordered by sun loungers and a small BBQ area, creating a relaxed outdoor space for families or groups of friends. Interiors are simple but practical, with air conditioning in all bedrooms and a fully equipped kitchen suited to longer stays.
top3.headline: Unlock Unrivaled Mallorca Luxury
top3.summary: Transform your getaway with a spacious villa boasting extra bedrooms and a private garden – an investment in unforgettable memories.

top3.description_short: First-line apartment on Port de Pollença’s Pine Walk with uninterrupted sea views and two en-suite bedrooms.
top3.description_long: This seafront apartment sits directly on the pedestrian Pine Walk, with the beach and shallow water just across the promenade. The living area opens onto a covered balcony that comfortably seats four for outdoor meals with panoramic bay views. Both bedrooms feature their own bathrooms, making the layout practical for two couples travelling together or parents wanting extra privacy. Interiors are simple and bright, with AC units in the living room and bedrooms, a well-equipped kitchen, and a washing machine for longer holiday stays.

top3.description_short: Ground-floor apartment opening directly onto a shared pool and garden area, a short walk from the rocky coves of Es Forti near Cala d’Or.
top3.description_long: Situated in a low-rise complex with Mediterranean-style gardens, this poolside apartment is designed for relaxed family holidays. The open living and dining space connects to a covered terrace just steps from the shared pool, letting you supervise children from the shade. Both bedrooms have their own bathrooms, and the kitchen is well-equipped for self-catering. With several small beaches and coves within walking distance, plus easy parking on surrounding streets, the apartment offers a practical balance between comfort and budget.

top3.description_short: Comfortable two-bedroom apartment in El Terreno, ideal for small families wanting easy access to Palma, the harbour, and nearby beaches.
top3.description_long: This family-friendly apartment is set on a quiet side street in El Terreno, a hillside neighborhood between Palma’s center and the seafront. The open-plan living and dining area connects to a small balcony with glimpses of the harbour. A fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and washing machine makes longer stays more convenient. One bedroom features a queen bed while the second has two single beds, both with air conditioning. Underground parking is included, and you can reach both Bellver Park and the Paseo Marítimo within a short walk.

top3.description_short: Stylish beach house with small private pool and direct access to Cala Major’s sandy cove, ideal for families or groups seeking a higher-end seaside stay.
top3.description_long: Set just one row back from the seafront, this four-bedroom house puts Cala Major’s beach, cafés, and beach clubs practically on your doorstep. The ground floor flows from a modern open kitchen into a light-filled dining and living area, opening onto a patio with a plunge pool, sun loungers, and gas BBQ. Upstairs, most bedrooms feature partial sea views and individual air-conditioning units. While you are within walking distance of shops and restaurants, the enclosed terrace and private garage add an extra sense of comfort and privacy for longer stays.

top3.location: Palma Old Town, Palma de Mallorca
top3.description_short: Design-led penthouse on the edge of Palma’s old town with a large private terrace and access to a small building gym.
top3.description_long: Located on the top floor of a modern building just outside the pedestrianised streets of the old town, this penthouse is all about outdoor space and natural light. Floor-to-ceiling windows open onto a generous rooftop terrace with lounge seating, dining table, and views across tiled rooftops towards the cathedral. Inside, a sleek kitchen and island sit at the heart of the open-plan living area, with three compact but well-planned bedrooms and two bathrooms leading off the hallway. Guests have access to a small shared gym on the first floor, making the apartment suited to longer city stays and remote work setups.

top3.description_short: Expansive high-end estate with large pool, Jacuzzi, and dedicated gym, set in a quiet coastal residential area near the southwest of Mallorca.
top3.description_long: Conceived as a private retreat, this estate offers generous indoor and outdoor living spaces spread across a landscaped plot with mature trees. The heart of the property is the pool terrace, where an integrated Jacuzzi, loungers, and an outdoor kitchen with gas BBQ create a resort-like feel. Inside, an open living and dining area flows into a fully fitted kitchen, with an additional TV lounge and a small office that can double as a workspace. Bedrooms are distributed between the ground and first floors, each with individually controlled AC and plenty of wardrobe space, making the house well suited to multi-generational stays or small retreats.
top3.headline: Experience Mallorca in unparalleled luxury.
top3.summary: Indulge in the ultimate in private luxury – a seamless transition to a magnificent Estate where memories are made.
